name: login_page
description: Login Page Project with Backend Development This project features a simple login page developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with an ongoing backend development. Users can input their email and password to log in. ![image](https://github.com/CEPIZIN/login_page/assets/116749645/3023d6a7-b29c-4bf5-911a-bc0e33afb577)
